description: Applies an atmospheric correction that converts top of atmosphere reflectance values into bottom of atmosphere/top of canopy reflectance values.

parameters.description: Data cube containing multi-spectral optical top of atmosphere reflectances to be corrected.
parameters.name: data

parameters.description:
The atmospheric correction method to use. To get reproducible results, you have to set a specific method.

Set to `null` to allow the back-end to choose, which will improve portability, but reduce reproducibility as you *may* get different results if you run the processes multiple times.
parameters.name: method

parameters.description: The digital elevation model to use. Set to `null` (the default) to allow the back-end to choose, which will improve portability, but reduce reproducibility.
parameters.name: elevation_model

parameters.description: Proprietary options for the atmospheric correction method. Specifying proprietary options will reduce portability.
parameters.name: options

returns.description: Data cube containing bottom of atmosphere reflectances.

DigitalElevationModelInvalid.message: The digital elevation model specified is either not a DEM or can't be used with the data cube given.

links.title: Atmospheric correction explained by EO4GEO body of knowledge.
